description: Add Only Flag.  Indicates that the service is an add only, not an update.

AirlineObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

AirlineObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

AirlineObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Airline_Data.description: Airline Reference ID. Uniquely identifies an Airline.
Airline Value. The text description (title) of an airline.

Merchant_CodeObject.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Merchant_CodeObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Merchant_CodeObject.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Airline_Data.description: A Merchant Code to map to this Airline. If a Merchant Code is specified, it will be used on Expense Credit Card Transactions to match the specified Merchant Code to this Airline.

validation.validation: The Merchant Code selected is already mapped to a different Merchant: [merchant]
validation.description: Each Merchant Code can only be assigned to one Merchant (Airline, Hotel, or Car Rental Agency).

Airline_Data.description: Alternate Names for Merchant are entered here.

validation.validation: [alternate_name] is already used as an alternate name.
[alternate_name] is already used a merchant name.
The Airline Data Value "[value]" is already in use.
validation.description: Spend Data instances of the same Data Value and Attribute Type is not allowed.

validation.validation: [merchant_name] is already used as an alternate name.
